directions: Place potato wedges on a cookie sheet. Drizzle with just enough oil to coat. Season with Italian dried seasoning, salt and pepper. Roast potatoes and turn after 15 to 20 minutes. Sprinkle cheese liberally on potatoes and roast another 10 minutes, serve.
ingredients: 3 all-purpose potatoes (russet); cut into thin wedges
2 tb extra-virgin olive oil; just enough to coat
1 teaspoon dried Italian seasoning; or 1/2 teaspoon each dried oregano, thyme, parsley
title: Herb and Cheese Oven Fries
